document.title: Upper Arch Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: This is a simple case involving the use of clear aligners to treat the upper arch. The treatment is expected to last between 4 to 6 months. Monitoring will be primarily remote, and extensive attachments will be utilized to aid in the alignment process. Whitening is not included in this treatment plan.
key_points: Simple case expected to last 4-6 months
